workExperience.title: Volunteer Web Developer
descriptions: Supervised the asset creation, new feature management, and technical design and implementation of the redesigned web domain, leveraging various technologies to offer a fully transformative and modern webpage experience.
Provided overall maintenance and general upkeep for the website, including updates for events and accounting for new volunteers joining the team throughout the development process.
Improved overall usability of the existing features from the previous website, enhancing site naviagtion, contact form functionality, and site metadata for optimizing SEO.

portfolio.description: Supervised and led the overall redesign process for the EcoPRT lab website, assuming key roles in commissioning new photography and assets, along with revamping the social media presence to offer a more welcoming environment to new members. Implemented with Vue and Three.js.

Open source desktop clone replicating the functionality of the UE MEGABOOM mobile app, used for compatibility with LE capable Bluetooth speakers. Features include turning on the speaker remotely, volume and mixing controls, and speaker customization. Implemented using Electron.js, Three.js, and Noble BLE library.

Constructed a backend web scraping API for retrieving basketball game data for the NC State Men and Women's Basketball teams - the API is combined with an Android mobile app for displaying upcoming, past, won, and lost games. Implemented with Java, Android Studio, and Node.js.
